languages.text: "Глейто почуял одного из культистов. Я уж было подумал, ваша секта показала свое истинное лицо и начала устранять экипаж. Официально снимаю с вас подозрения — но только по этому инциденту".

"Glaito sensed one of the cultists coming. I thought your sect had finally shown its true colours and had started assassinating the crew. You are officially cleared of suspicion — but in regard to this incident only."
languages.original_text: "Глейто почуял одного из культистов. Я уж было подумал, ваша секта показала свое истинное лицо и начала устранять экипаж. Официально снимаю с вас подозрения — но только по этому инциденту".

traits.locale_text: "Glaito sensed one of the cultists coming. I thought that your sect had finally shown its true colours and started assassinating the crew. You are officially cleared of suspicion — in regard to this incident only."

"Glaito sensed one of the cultists coming. I thought your sect had finally shown its true colours and had started assassinating the crew. You are officially cleared of suspicion — but in regard to this incident only."

languages.text: 「カルト信者の一人が近づいてくるのを、グライトが察知した。てっきりお前の宗派が本性を現して、クルーの暗殺を始めたのかと思った。お前の嫌疑は正式に晴れた。ただし、今回の件に限っての話だ」
languages.original_text: "Glaito sensed one of the cultists coming. I thought your sect had finally shown its true colours and had started assassinating the crew. You are officially cleared of suspicion — but in regard to this incident only."

traits.locale_text: 「カルト信者の一人が近づいてくるのを、グライトが察知した。てっきりお前の宗派が本性を現して、クルーの暗殺を始めたのかと思った。お前の嫌疑は正式に晴れた。ただし、今回の件に限っての話だ」

languages.text: "Glaito hat gespürt, dass einer der Kultisten kommt. Ich dachte, Eure Sekte hätte endlich ihr wahres Gesicht gezeigt und angefangen, die Crew zu ermorden. Ihr werdet offiziell nicht mehr verdächtigt. Allerdings nur in Bezug auf diesen Vorfall."
languages.original_text: "Glaito sensed one of the cultists coming. I thought your sect had finally shown its true colours and had started assassinating the crew. You are officially cleared of suspicion — but in regard to this incident only."

traits.locale_text: "Glaito hat gespürt, dass einer der Kultisten kommt. Ich dachte, Eure Sekte hätte endlich ihr wahres Gesicht gezeigt und angefangen, die Crew zu ermorden. Ihr werdet offiziell nicht mehr verdächtigt. Allerdings nur in Bezug auf diesen Vorfall."

languages.text: « Glaito a senti venir l'un des cultistes. J'ai cru que votre secte avait enfin montré son vrai visage et s'était mise à assassiner l'équipage. Vous êtes officiellement disculpés, mais uniquement de cet incident-là. »
languages.original_text: "Glaito sensed one of the cultists coming. I thought your sect had finally shown its true colours and had started assassinating the crew. You are officially cleared of suspicion — but in regard to this incident only."

traits.locale_text: « Glaito a senti venir l'un des cultistes. J'ai cru que votre secte avait enfin montré son vrai visage et s'était mise à assassiner l'équipage. Vous êtes officiellement disculpés, mais uniquement de cet incident-là. »

languages.text: «Glaito captó la llegada de uno de los sectarios. Creía que su culto se había quitado por fin la careta y estaba asesinando a la tripulación. Queda oficialmente libre de toda sospecha, pero únicamente en lo relativo a este incidente».
languages.original_text: "Glaito sensed one of the cultists coming. I thought your sect had finally shown its true colours and had started assassinating the crew. You are officially cleared of suspicion — but in regard to this incident only."

traits.locale_text: «Glaito captó la llegada de uno de los sectarios. Creía que su culto se había quitado por fin la careta y estaba asesinando a la tripulación. Queda oficialmente libre de toda sospecha, pero únicamente en lo relativo a este incidente».

languages.text: “格雷托发现了邪教徒的踪迹，我还以为你的教派终于露出了真面目，开始干起暗杀船员的勾当了呢。你已经正式洗脱嫌疑了，但仅限当下这件事情。”
languages.original_text: "Glaito sensed one of the cultists coming. I thought your sect had finally shown its true colours and had started assassinating the crew. You are officially cleared of suspicion — but in regard to this incident only."

traits.locale_text: “格雷托发现了邪教徒的踪迹，我还以为你的教派终于露出了真面目，开始干起暗杀船员的勾当了呢。你已经正式洗脱嫌疑了，但仅限当下这件事情。”

languages.text: "Glaito, tarikatçılardan birinin geldiğini hissetti. Tarikatın sonunda gerçek yüzünü gösterdiğini ve mürettebata suikast düzenlemeye başladığını sanıyordum. Yalnızca bu hadise hususunda resmî olarak aklandınız."
languages.original_text: "Glaito sensed one of the cultists coming. I thought your sect had finally shown its true colours and had started assassinating the crew. You are officially cleared of suspicion — but in regard to this incident only."

traits.locale_text: "Glaito, tarikatçılardan birinin geldiğini hissetti. Tarikatın sonunda gerçek yüzünü gösterdiğini ve mürettebata suikast düzenlemeye başladığını sanıyordum. Yalnızca bu hadise hususunda resmî olarak aklandınız."
